product_details.name: Nooky Tempting Delights for uplifing mood (Packof 3) | Luxury Dark Chocolate Best Gift Set for Men & Women | instaeats

Luxury Dark Chocolate Best Gift Set for Men & Women | instaeats
Specialty: Vegetarian. Weight: 200 Grams. Ingredient Type: Dark Chocolate & overall well-being. Contains 5 different herbs. Brand: InstaEats. Form: Bar. Package Information: Box. Net Quantity: 300.0 gram. Product Dimensions: 13 x 1 x 7.5 cm; 200 g. Ingredients: Dark Chocolate. Country of Origin: India. Item Weight: 200 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 1 x 7.5 Centimeters. Generic Name: Chocolate.

banner_details:
The banner features a product promotion layout for a premium dark chocolate gift set. The composition is set within a soft beige background bordered by curved decorative lines and subtle overlays, evoking a refined, elegant look. The top includes a bold title layer (`heading`) in dark brown, followed by a secondary title (`subheading`) in a warm bronze tone. To its left, a descriptive text block (`description`) outlines the product features in a clean, legible serif font. A rich-toned price tag (`price`) overlays a faint circle graphic, and a call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) in deep red enhances immediate engagement. The right section is dominated by a lifestyle image (`product_image`) showcasing the product in use, appealing to aspirational emotions.

**Color Palette**:  
- Soft Beige (#F5EEE6)  
- Dark Brown (#6B3E26)  
- Warm Bronze (#C17F59)  
- Rich Maroon (#8B1A1A)  
- Muted Rose (#D4B0A5)  
- Ivory White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image uses a rich and elegant color palette, blending deep chocolate browns, warm skin tones, and bold reds. The chocolate bar itself features a luxurious dark brown (#4B2E2B) contrasted with golden typography (#D4AF37), evoking a sense of premium quality. The model’s deep red dress (#8B1A33) adds a striking pop of color, drawing attention while complementing the brown tones of the chocolate. Her natural skin tone (#F5C9A6) and the soft lighting create a warm and inviting atmosphere. These colors are harmoniously blended yet distinct, guiding focus to the product while maintaining visual sophistication and emotional warmth.
